General.Name: Bumi Citra Permai Tbk
General.Description: PT Bumi Citra Permai Tbk engages in the development of industrial estates and warehousing locations primarily in Indonesia. It also engages in the clearing, development, preparation, mapping/plotting, and sale of land for industrial and commercial usage, as well as for housing areas. In addition, the company is also involved in the treatment and supply of water. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Kramat Raya, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10450
